CustomField.description: When checked and when the badge is assigned to an account, all contacts of that account, child accounts, and child account's contacts will inherit the benefits. Limited to only one level of child accounts.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When checked and when the badge is assigned to an account, all contacts of that account, child accounts, and child account's contacts will inherit the benefits. Limited to only one level of child accounts.
CustomField.label: Enable Badge Flow-down
